Con Gracia was simply perfect.The atmosphere was minimalist yet cozy; the servers were friendly and attentive without being annoying intrusive. Helpfully, their English was great.  This was a good thing for someone whose Spanish is rusty and his Catalan non-existent.And then there was the food.I went for the Surprise Menu paired with the Surprise Wine Tasting, and I would recommend this course to everyone.  What fun is a tasting menu when you know what's coming next?  The server asks you for any food allergies, strong likes or dislikes, and soon a procession of dishes begin marching across your table.  And the wine pairings were spot-on.Go to Con Gracia, and be pleasantly surprised.
